subject: Coaches and Managers
Tennis
lead_paragraph: For the first time since working with Patrick McEnroe and his doubles partner, Jonathan Stark, in 1993, Larry Stefanki is coaching an American: Andy Roddick.
snippet: For the first time since working with Patrick McEnroe and his doubles partner, Jonathan Stark, in 1993, Larry Stefanki is coaching an American: Andy Roddick.
